Lead Developer:

- Sergej Chodarev

Contributors:

- Ján Juhár
- Sebastián Trebuňák -- original author of Kpimark, Bootstrap theme, logging and i18n

IT4KT Builder uses code and ideas from other tools developed for the IT4KT
project by various authors, including:

- Michaela Bačíková
- Miroslav Biňas
- Ján Juhár
- Dominik Lakatoš
- Jaroslav Porubän
